message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you see in it, but I believe I can find it elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay $12000 for the product.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $13500. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. My maximum offer for the product remains at $12000.
